summary: Very small mod, which activates when you are a vampire, so your race will be called a vampire,  with  description, for immersion.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][u]I am a Vampire[/u][/center][/size]

[size=2]This is a small mod, it changes your race name to \'Vampire\', when you are infact a vampire, instead of just the default race name. Also, it adds a racial description for vampires, off TES wiki.

It only activates when you are a vampire, the none-vampire race names are unaffected.

This was just a quick fix for some added immersion, and personal preference.

[b][u]To Install[/u][/b]
Just put it in your Skyrim\'s Data folder, and away you go, done. There should be no incompatibilities.

[b][u]To Uninstall[/u][/b]
Remove the esp from your Data folder.

Have fun,
Kieranh7 (Asmodean)
[/size]
author: Kieranh7
